name: Mine's Fight
description:
Mochi is a miner who works every day in the Cave Gold. He has a rounded and gentle appearance, he is always with his helmet and beak, with some spots (typical of miners) and must take care of the natural risks of the job. There he extracts precious stones (Emeralds). Day by day he must get as much product as possible. 

Sounds used:

  1. FX:
    1. Metal Strike on Wood.mp3
    2. Walk on Rocks.mp3
    3. sound-magical-pickup-item.mp3
  2. Music and Enviroment sound:
    1. Looping Ascent - Joel Cummins.mp3
    2. ambient_54.mp3
